notes.text: The affected product uses an unmaintained ActiveX control, which may allow an out-of-bounds write condition while processing a specific project file. CVE-2022-2892 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.8 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Additional mitigation guidance and recommended practices are publicly available on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics in the technical information paper, ICS-TIP-12-146-01B--Targeted Cyber Intrusion Detection and Mitigation Strategies.
